scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix cklogicore-backend && npm install --prefix cklogicore-frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix cklogicore-backend" "npm run dev --prefix cklogicore-frontend"
scripts.render-build: npm install && npm install --prefix cklogicore-backend && npm install --prefix cklogicore-frontend && npx vite build cklogicore-frontend --config cklogicore-frontend/vite.config.js
